title: WATCH: 3 things you might have missed in 'Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker' trailer
text:
WATCH: 3 things you might have missed in 'Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker' trailer

Cape Town - On Tuesday Disney released the final trailer for Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.

The trailer was packed with new locations and characters, and it was easy to miss all the references, hidden details, and Easter Eggs.

In this video MojoTV combed through shot-by-shot to count down the things you might have missed!

With J. J. Abrams back at the helm, and Rey, Finn, Poe, and Chewie apparently reunited, "The Rise of Skywalker" is shaping up to be an adventure worth waiting for.

The film releases in SA cinemas on Friday, 20 December.

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht.
description: In this video MojoTV combed through shot-by-shot to count down the things you might have missed!
